titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that any general appropriation bill making appropriations for the Veterans' Administration may not make appropriations for any other department or agency of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1666)

bill.summary: 4/21/1993--Introduced. Amends rule XXI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit the Committee on Appropriations from reporting any general appropriation bill for the Department of Veterans Affairs that makes appropriations for any other Federal department or agency.
